Uses of Interface
xxl.core.util.Distance

  • Packages that use Distance 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.comparators
    Provides some useful additional Comparators based on Comparator.
    xxl.core.functions
    Functions are an extremely important concept to encapsulate abstractions.
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.math
    The package xxl.core.math provides classes that issue mathematical topics.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.
    xxl.core.predicates
    This package provides Predicates.
    xxl.core.spatial
    Support data types and building-blocks for spatial, temporal and mining algorithms (e.g. similarity joins)
    xxl.core.util
    This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

    • Uses of Distance in xxl.core.util

      Fields in xxl.core.util with type parameters of type Distance 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<Object,Distance> Distance.EUCLIDEAN
      A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_2 metric ("euclidean" metric).
      static Function<Object,Distance> Distance.LEVENSHTEIN
      A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the Levenshtein distance.
      static Function<Object,Distance> Distance.MANHATTEN
      A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_1 metric ("manhatten" metric).
